column1: It's so nice to see you, son. I'm so proud that you're part of the 4 Million Child Recorder Blow.
That's not true! Your father loved you! Often!
Nohoho! No! If I knew I would have made him do it!
He says you didn't molest him as a child!

You did the right thing, Poppa.
